title: Convert DWORD to String
description: This function converts a DWORD input into a string representation consisting of 32 binary characters. Each bit of the DWORD is converted to its corresponding binary character ('0' or '1') and the resulting string is null-terminated.
name: DWORD_TO_STRB

input.name: IN
input.description: The input DWORD value that needs to be converted to a string.

output.name: DWORD_TO_STRB
output.description: The output string representation of the input DWORD value, containing binary characters.

return_value.description: The resulting binary string derived from the input DWORD.
